Title: Orchard Responsive Theme Machine
Description: A responsive version of the Orchard CMS "Theme Machine" which is commonly used as a starting point for building custom themes. Supports many resolutions.
HomeWiki:
by Planet Telex

A responsive version of the Orchard CMS "Theme Machine" which is commonly used as a starting point for building custom themes. Supports many resolutions.


View Live Demo

Requirements:

  • Orchard CMS 1.6 - 1.8

Resolutions:

  • Base (All devices)
  • Mobile devices (iPhone, Android phones)
    • Portrait view (320px screen width)
    • Landscape view (480px screen width)
  • Small tablets like Kindle Fire, Nook, etc. (600px screen width)
  • Large Tablet devices in portrait like iPad, Android tablets (768px screen width)
  • Large Tablets in Landscape/Laptop computers (1004px screen width)
  • Desktop computers (1280px screen width)
  • Widescreens (1400px screen width)

Quick Start:

  1. Download the latest package and install it on an Orchard CMS instance.
  2. Go to "Themes" in the Orchard admin menu and click the "Set Current" button under "The Theme Machine Responsive".
  3. Rename and modify to suit your custom design.
